heroSubtitle: Junior Full Stack Developer focused on Front-end
heroDescription: Junior Full Stack Developer, focused on Frontend and experienced in web and desktop development. Skilled in React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, among other technologies. Committed to delivering quality solutions, aligning performance, usability, and best development practices.

aboutSubtitle: Developer passionate about creating solutions that make a difference
aboutIntroText: 21-year-old developer from ParanÃ¡, currently in the last year of Software Engineering. My journey in programming began out of curiosity to understand how technologies work and how I can create solutions that make a difference in people's lives.
aboutAcademicText: I'm a student in the final period of the Software Engineering course at UGV â€“ University Center, expected to graduate in December 2025. During college, I developed complete projects applying agile methodologies, versioning with Git/GitHub, and integration between frontend and backend. I participated in academic and personal projects, focusing on creating real solutions for companies and institutions.
aboutTeamText: I am skilled at working in teams, maintaining good communication and collaboration daily. I have practical experience in teams organized by agile methodologies, always contributing proactively to task development. I use Git, GitHub, and Jira to keep the workflow organized and efficient.
aboutPhilosophyText: I adopt a work philosophy focused on commitment, organization, and delivering functional solutions. I always seek to align technical quality with defined deadlines, paying attention to details and seeking continuous improvement. I value clear communication and collaboration to achieve consistent results as a team.
aboutCtaText: I am looking for my first opportunity as a junior developer or intern, aiming to collaborate on real projects, contributing to team growth and delivering efficient and well-structured solutions.
